IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
api-too-old: Please update {{apiName}}({{APIID}}) to at least version {{minversion}}. Current version {{currentversion}}. Integration disabled.
mod-description: Allows you to pick your enchantment at the forge.
TooltipBehavior.title: Tooltip Behavior.
TooltipBehavior.description: Whether or not to display tooltips that tell you what each enchantment does. Immersive: tooltips are only shown after seeing a certain journal scrap.
EnableTooltipAutogeneration.title: Enables tooltip autogeneration.
EnableTooltipAutogeneration.description: Enables tooltip autogeneration from journal scrap 9. Disable this if you have an mod that edits that.
LeftArrow.title: Left Arrow
LeftArrow.description: A button that corresponds to the left arrow on the menu.
RightArrow.title: Right Arrow
RightArrow.description: A button that corresponds to the right arrow on the menu.
